meanings.sent1: Epiphytology involves researching plants that grow on other plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use epiphytology to learn about epiphytes.
meanings.sent3: In epiphytology class, we learn all about plant hitchhikers!
meanings.sent4: Exploring epiphytology is like discovering a hidden garden in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of epiphytology lies in understanding the plant relationships up high.

meanings.definition: The branch of botany that focuses on epiphytic plants.
meanings.sent1: Epiphytology is a fascinating field that studies plants growing on other plants.
meanings.sent2: Botanists specializing in epiphytology study the unique characteristics of epiphytic plants.
meanings.sent3: The quirky world of epiphytology reveals the secrets of plant climbers.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of knowledge, epiphytology branches out like a tree of discovery.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of epiphytology make it a captivating botanical study.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of plants that grow on other plants.
meanings.sent1: Epiphytology helps us understand how plants thrive on other plants.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use epiphytology to explore the relationships between plants growing on other plants.
meanings.sent3: Studying epiphytology is like solving a green puzzle of plant partnerships.
meanings.sent4: The world of epiphytology unveils the interconnectedness of plant life.
meanings.sent5: Through epiphytology, we delve into the mysteries of plant companionship in the canopy.
